                    ValidationException,

        Description copied from interface: IPathManager
        Return path from XML DB.
        Specified by:
        getPath in interface IPathManager
        Parameters:
        from - starting station of searching path
        to - ending station of searching path
        Returns:
        Path from DB with given data.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - when XML DB operation fails
        ValidationException - when XML data source breaks validation rules
        IllegalEntityException - when there does not exists non-transferable link in IDS JMK with stations from and to
